name: Leona, Determined
effect:
[Shield] (+1 [S] while I'm a defender.)
When I attack, stun an enemy unit here. (It doesn't deal combat damage this turn.)

name: Leona, Zealot
effect:
If an opponent's score is within 3 points of the Victory Score, I enter ready.
Stunned enemy units here have -8 [S], to a minimum of 1 [S].

name: Lucian, Gunslinger
effect:
[Assault]  (+1 [S] while I'm an attacker.) 
When I attack, deal damage equal to my [Assault] to an enemy unit here.

name: Navori Fighting Pit
effect: When you hold here, buff a unit here. (If it doesn't have a buff, it gets a +1 [S] buff.)

name: Reaver's Row
effect: When you defend here, you may move a friendly unit here to base.

name: Teemo, Strategist
effect:
[Hidden] (Hide now for 1 rune of any type to react with later for 0 energy.)
When I defend or I'm played from [Hidden], reveal the top 5 cards of your Main Deck. Deal 1 to an enemy unit here for each card with [Hidden], then recycle them.

name: Twisted Fate, Gambler
effect:
When I attack, reveal the top rune of your rune deck, then recycle it. Do one of the following based on its domain:
\* [R] — Deal 2 to an enemy unit here and 1 to all other enemy units here.
\* [B] — Draw 1.
\* [Y] — Stun an enemy unit.

name: Void Gate
effect: Spells and abilities affecting units here each deal 1 Bonus Damage. (Each instance of damage the spell deals is increased by 1.)

name: Volibear, Furious
effect:
[Deflect 2] (Opponents must pay \[A]\[A] to choose me with a spell or ability.)
When I attack, deal 5 damage split among any number of enemy units here.

name: Warwick, Hunter
effect:
I enter ready.
When I attack, kill all damaged enemy units here.

name: Yasuo, Remorseful
effect: When I attack, deal damage equal to my Might to an enemy unit here.

name: Peak Guardian
effect: When you play me, buff me. Then, if I am at a battlefield, buff all other friendly units there. (To buff a unit, give it a +1 [S] buff if it doesn't already have one.)

name: Siphon Power
effect:
[Reaction] (Play any time, even before spells and abilities resolve.)
Choose a battlefield. Give friendly units there +1 [S] this turn and enemy units there -1 [S] this turn, to a minimum of 1 [S].
